snippet: DRAPKIN--Donald. The Garden School community notes with sadness the passing of Donald Drapkin '64, our esteemed alumnus and friend. Our thoughts are with his family, friends and classmates. Richard Marotta, Ph.D., Headmaster Michael Rakosi '64, Board President Jackson Heights, NY 1/3
lead_paragraph: DRAPKIN--Donald. The Garden School community notes with sadness the passing of Donald Drapkin '64, our esteemed alumnus and friend. Our thoughts are with his family, friends and classmates. Richard Marotta, Ph.D., Headmaster Michael Rakosi '64, Board President Jackson Heights, NY 1/3
